heading: Error

subheadings.paypalGeneric: Something went wrong processing your request

descriptions.default: Please try your action again, if the problem persists, please [contact us](/contact).

descriptions.paypalNotLoggedIn: Your payment has not been processed. Please log back in and try to become a member again.
